Further info dermatologist object-100 Va: When i read the vignette I assumed her skin was probably typical teenage skin with acne, which is why i thought a dermatologist appt might help. Treatment object-86 Response: Third wave cognitive behavioural therapy (e.g. ACT; CFT; DBT; MBCT; Schema therapy)
Further info dermatologist object-100 Va: if her skin is the driving factor for her difficulties then addressing this may reduce her anxieties and increase her self esteem. If the issues with her skin have been exacerbated by prior anxieties and low self-esteem then that might just be addressing one part of her anxieties and therefore the low mood and anxiety will continue and potentially shift to another issue.
Guidelines object-94 Value: usually for low mood or anxiety sessions are between 8-12 depending on severity of symptoms and impact of the intervention, this may be reviewed earlier than 12 sessions if the intervention has good affect.
